conversation.content: Namaste! Main Triotech ki Sales Assistant hoon.  Main aapki kis tarah help kar sakti hoon?
"Explain the complete workflow of how Convoze analyzes customer conversations"

Ji, bilkul!  Convoze ke customer conversation analysis workflow ko samajhne ke liye, main aapko step-by-step guide deta hu:

**1. Data Ingestion:** Pehle, Convoze aapke different channels se conversations collect karta hai â€“ jaise ki phone calls, emails, live chat, aur social media.  Yeh data different formats mein ho sakta hai.

**2. Data Preprocessing:** Is step mein, Convoze data ko clean karta hai aur standardize karta hai.  Isme noise removal, data transformation, aur language standardization shamil hai.  Yeh zaroori hai ki analysis accurate ho.

**3. Conversation Transcription (Agar zaroori ho):** Agar aapke paas audio ya video calls hain, toh Convoze unko text mein convert karta hai using advanced speech-to-text technology.  Isse analysis karna easy ho jata hai.

**4. Natural Language Processing (NLP):**  Yeh Convoze ka core hai.  NLP algorithms customer conversations ko understand karte hain.  Isme sentiment analysis (positive, negative, neutral), topic extraction, keyword identification, aur entity recognition shamil hai.

**5. Advanced Analytics:**  Ab, Convoze extracted insights ko use karke advanced analytics karta hai.  Yeh insights business-critical decisions lene mein help karte hain.  Examples mein include: customer satisfaction trends, agent performance analysis, common customer issues, and areas for improvement.

**6. Reporting and Visualization:** Aakhir mein, Convoze aapko easily understandable reports aur dashboards deta hai.  Inmein key findings aur actionable insights visually presented hote hain.  Aap isse apne business decisions ko improve kar sakte hain.

Toh yeh Convoze ka complete workflow hai.  Kya aapko iske kisi specific feature mein zyada interest hai, ya aapko koi aur sawal hai?  Agar aapko Convoze ke demo ya pricing ke baare mein jaanna hai, toh mujhe bata sakte hain.
